b2s_clf.experiments package¶

Submodules¶

b2s_clf.experiments.cross_validation module¶

class b2s_clf.experiments.cross_validation.CrossValidationExperiment(df, subject_dictionary, sampler_dictionary, ensemble_dictionary, transformer_dictionary)[source]¶

Bases: b2s_clf.experiments.experiment.Experiment

A class that calls parent class Experiment to run a k-fold cross-validation experiment.

run(cv_batches, test_set_size, verbose=False)[source]¶

Calls b2s_clf.experiments.Experiment._run() with specific k-fold cross_validation parameters.

Parameters

  • cv_batches – Total cross-validation batches to run.

  • test_set_size – Class-wise size of the testing sample (i.e. test_size=10 –> len(test_set) = 20)

  • verbose – Whether to print progress on screen.

b2s_clf.experiments.experiment module¶

class b2s_clf.experiments.experiment.Experiment(df, subject_dictionary, sampler_dictionary, ensemble_dictionary, transformer_dictionary)[source]¶

Bases: object

A class to perform cross-validation experiments. It supports k-fold cross-validation, leave-one-out cross-validation and stratified cross-validation, which implements through the corresponding sub-classes.

b2s_clf.experiments.leave_one_out module¶

class b2s_clf.experiments.leave_one_out.LeaveOneOutExperiment(df, subject_dictionary, sampler_dictionary, ensemble_dictionary, transformer_dictionary)[source]¶

Bases: b2s_clf.experiments.experiment.Experiment

A class that calls parent class Experiment to run a leave-one-out (LOO) cross-validation experiment.

run(loo_variable, verbose=False)[source]¶

Calls b2s_clf.experiments.Experiment._run() with specific LOO cross_validation parameters.

Parameters

  • loo_variable – Strata or discrete variable that admits a LOO routine.

  • verbose – Whether to print progress on screen.

b2s_clf.experiments.stratified_cross_validation module¶

class b2s_clf.experiments.stratified_cross_validation.StratifiedCrossValidationExperiment(df, subject_dictionary, sampler_dictionary, ensemble_dictionary, transformer_dictionary)[source]¶

Bases: b2s_clf.experiments.experiment.Experiment

A class that calls parent class Experiment to run a stratified cross-validation (SCV) experiment.

run(strata_variable, balanced_by, verbose=False)[source]¶

Calls b2s_clf.experiments.Experiment._run() with specific SCV parameters.

Parameters

  • strata_variable – Strata or discrete variable used to build the SCV batches.

  • balanced_by – A second binary variable to balance the SCV batches upon.

  • verbose – Whether to print progress on screen.
